# delegate

**Instance Property**

The receiver’s delegate.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor unowned(unsafe) var delegate: (any UIWebViewDelegate)? { get set }
```

## Discussion

The delegate is sent messages when content is loading. See [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIWebViewDelegate] for the optional methods this delegate may implement.



## Responding to web view changes

- **UIWebViewDelegate**: The `UIWebViewDelegate` protocol defines methods that a delegate of a [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIWebView] object can optionally implement to intervene when web content is loaded.
